## Install

```sh
$ npm install --save-dev babel-preset-jest
```

## Usage

<<<<<<< HEAD
### Via `babel.config.js` (Recommended)

```js
module.exports = {
  presets: ['jest'],
};
=======
### Via `.babelrc` (Recommended)

**.babelrc**

```json
{
  "presets": ["jest"]
}
>>>>>>> fb9087a8f6cdc7859ecd725957ccb7c04a787284
```

### Via CLI

```sh
$ babel script.js --presets jest
```

### Via Node API

```javascript
<<<<<<< HEAD
require('@babel/core').transform('code', {

});
